Taxon occurences

Source: vignettes/taxon-occurences.Rmd
taxon-occurences.Rmd
library(tscr)

Setup tscr

Read how to setup tscr to the TSC API.

Download Taxon Occurrences from TSC

We get Taxon occurrences with their point representation from TSC. Currently, all Fauna and Flora occurrences have only points, not polygons. In future, Flora Populations can be captured as polygons representing the entire population, or a surveyed part of it.

areas <- tsc_GET("area", chunk_size = 100) %>% tsc_parse()
# Areas as tibble
head(areas) %>% knitr::kable()

# Taxon occurrences with their Point representation
tae_res <- tsc_GET("occ-taxon-points", max_records = 10) 

# Taxon occurrences as tibble
tae <- tae_res %>% tsc_parse()
head(tae) %>% knitr::kable()
     
# Taxon occurrences as GeoJSON SimpleFeatures for plotting
tae_gj <- tae_res %>%
  magrittr::extract2("data") %>%
  geojsonio::as.json() %>%
  geojsonsf::geojson_sf()
mapview::mapview(tae_gj)
